duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the Team Leader in all aspects of daily operations including profitability, expense control, buying, merchandising, and labor.
Develop and maintain creative store layout and product merchandising.
Work with Team Leader to achieve sales, purchasing, and labor targets.
Assist in the analysis of sales, reports, and labor.
Assist in annual sales and expense projections and budget preparation.
Assist with ordering and inventory management.
Resolve team concerns or issues with guidance from Team Leader.
Lead and develop Team Members, providing training and mentorship.
Provide courteous, friendly, and efficient service to customers and Team Members.
Maintain awareness of customer flows and needs, responding promptly to their inquiries.
